analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/17/0x67835bd73dc219c068779e773351fbcb7d0a45d7.sol#739-747) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/17/0x67835bd73dc219c068779e773351fbcb7d0a45d7.sol#744)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/17/0x67835bd73dc219c068779e773351fbcb7d0a45d7.sol#759-772) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/17/0x67835bd73dc219c068779e773351fbcb7d0a45d7.sol#765-772)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/17/0x67835bd73dc219c068779e773351fbcb7d0a45d7.sol#776-784) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

BoltCrowdsaleTwo._isBonusAvailable (/unique_chucks/17/0x67835bd73dc219c068779e773351fbcb7d0a45d7.sol#910-916) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

BoltCrowdsaleTwo.deliverBonusTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x67835bd73dc219c068779e773351fbcb7d0a45d7.sol#987-1001) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
